title: Exception Thrown When Exporting Data from Table Inside a Grid Cell
description: I encountered an issue where an exception is thrown when attempting to export data from a table that is inside a grid cell.
OB: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from a table located within a grid cell.
EB: The software should allow users to export data from a table within a grid cell without any exceptions or errors. The export functionality should work as expected, generating the appropriate output file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a grid component into the application.
2. Attempt to export data from a table that is located within one of the grid cells.
